'''Floating Crystal Flowers and Floating Crystal Platforms''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]].

The player must use the ability of the [[Xenochromatic Ball Octopus]] to make it spin, after which a series of floating platforms will appear and then become invisible. The player must remember the positions of the platforms and make their way to some end platform where there typically is a reward.
